Plot Average Daily Feed Intake (ADFI) Curves

Source: R/adfi_plot.R
adfi_plot.Rd

Creates and optionally saves visualization plots for pig feed intake data based on ADFI (Average Daily Feed Intake) calculations. The function generates detailed feed intake curve plots with original and corrected values, smoothing lines, and state indicators.

adfi_plot(
  data,
  responders = NULL,
  locations = NULL,
  color_theme = "d3",
  save_path = NULL,
  file_prefix = "loc",
  file_suffix = NULL,
  dpi = 300,
  device = "png",
  quiet = FALSE
)

Arguments

data

A list object returned by the adfi_get() function, containing ADFI data and related information.

responders

Character vector specifying which pig IDs to include. Default is NULL (all responders).

locations

Character vector specifying which locations to include. Default is NULL (all locations).

color_theme

Character string specifying the color theme to use from the ggsci package. Default is "d3". Available themes include: "npg", "aaas", "nejm", "lancet", "jama", "bjm", "jco", "d3", "observable", "locuszoom", "igv", "cosmic", "uchicago", "startrek", "tron", "futurama", "rickandmorty", "simpsons", "flatui", "frontiers", "ucscgb".

save_path

Character string specifying the path to save plots. Default is NULL (plots not saved).

file_prefix

Character string for the prefix of saved filenames. Default is "loc".

file_suffix

Character string for the suffix of saved filenames. Default is NULL (automatically set to "grow").

dpi

Numeric value for the resolution of saved plots. Default is 300.

device

Character string specifying the file format for saved plots. Default is "png". Supported formats: "png", "pdf", "jpeg", "tiff".

quiet

Logical. If TRUE, suppresses messages and warnings. Default: FALSE.

Value

A data.table containing:

  • location: Location identifier

  • data: List of data for each location

  • plot: List of ggplot2 objects for each location

Details

The plots created by adfi_plot include:

  • Original daily feed intake values (gray points)

  • Corrected daily feed intake values (colored by state)

  • LOESS smoothing line for corrected values

  • Horizontal reference lines showing average corrected ADFI

  • Text annotations showing original and corrected ADFI values

See also

adfi_get for calculating ADFI data adg_plot for plotting Average Daily Gain data

Examples

result_nedap <- preprocess_data(data = mintyr::nedap, station_type = "nedap", quiet = TRUE)
adg_result <- adg_get(result_nedap, my_break = c(30,120), quiet = TRUE)
adfi_result <- adfi_get(result_nedap, adg_result, quiet = TRUE)
res <- adfi_plot(data = adfi_result, save_path = tempdir(), location = "101", quiet = TRUE)
# Check exported files
list.files(path = tempdir(), pattern = "png", recursive = TRUE)
#> [1] "loc_101_adfi.png"
# Clean up exported files
files <- list.files(
  path = tempdir(),         # Default export directory
  pattern = "png",          # File type pattern to search
  recursive = TRUE,         # Search in subdirectories
  full.names = TRUE         # Return full file paths
)
file.remove(files)          # Remove all exported files
#> [1] TRUE
